ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
rust_compiler:
- rust
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version

about.summary: Fast full-text search engine library written in Rust

name: tantivy-py

about.summary: Fast full-text search engine library written in Rust
Fast full-text search engine library written in Rust

raw_meta_yaml:
# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prefix-dev/recipe-format/main/schema.json
schema_version: 1

context:
  version: "0.25.1"
  # see patch below
  maturin_min: "1.0"
  maturin_max: "2.0"

package:
  name: tantivy-py
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/t/tantivy/tantivy-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 68a3314699a7d18fcf338b52bae8ce46a97dde1128a3e47e33fa4db7f71f265e

build:
  number: 0
  script:
    - cargo-bundle-licenses --format yaml --output THIRDPARTY.yml
    - ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation --disable-pip-version-check

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler("c") }}
    - ${{ compiler("cxx") }}
    - ${{ compiler("rust") }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - cargo-bundle-licenses
    - cmake
    - make
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - maturin >=${{ maturin_min }},<${{ maturin_max }}
        - python
  host:
    - maturin >=${{ maturin_min }},<${{ maturin_max }}
    - pip
    - python
  run:
    - python

tests:
  - python:
      imports: tantivy
  - requirements:
      run:
        - pytest-cov
        - mktestdocs
    files:
      source:
        - tests/
    script:
      - coverage run --source=tantivy --branch -m pytest -vv --tb=long --color=yes
      - coverage report --show-missing --skip-covered --fail-under=100

about:
  summary: Fast full-text search engine library written in Rust
  license: MIT
  license_file:
    - THIRDPARTY.yml
    - LICENSE
  homepage: https://github.com/quickwit-oss/tantivy-py
  documentation: https://tantivy-py.readthedocs.io

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mediocretech
    - bollwyvl

about.summary: Fast full-text search engine library written in Rust
